div.a: The Strange History Of The Birth Certificate

div.div: These are the secrets, canards, and conflicting missions that gave rise to today’s birth certificate, whose deceptions continue to complicate the lives of a remarkably large number of children.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YgjMVe&via=Digg&text=The Strange History Of The Birth Certificate

div.a: Loophole May Mean Nobody Gets $1M Reward For Chris Dorner

div.div: Thanks to some careful phrasing, it appears as though the city can hold on to its cash because Dorner wasn't technically "captured" before he died.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WLjhF6&via=Digg&text=Loophole May Mean Nobody Gets $1M Reward For Chris Dorner

div.a: One Of The More Bizarre Phobias To Rise From The Web

div.div: Four years ago, my husband revealed one of his more peculiar qualities: He's freaked out by the sight of sliced cantaloupe.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WKK7Nt&via=Digg&text=One Of The More Bizarre Phobias To Rise From The Web

div.a: Watch A Supercut Of People Revealing Their Strange Addictions To Horrified Friends And Family

div.div: This is a show not just about strange addictions, but about the public's addiction to strangeness. It's a platform for weird people to tell their weird stories, hitting at the essence of reality TV with very little pretension.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11JhSCW&via=Digg&text=Watch A Supercut Of People Revealing Their Strange Addictions To Horrified Friends And Family

div.a: How To Watch Tomorrow's Record-Breaking Asteroid Flyby Of Earth

div.div: A large space rock known as asteroid 2012 DA14 will be zipping by our planet on Feb. 15, coming within 28,000 km of Earth, the closest approach ever seen for an object its size.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XGazHv&via=Digg&text=How To Watch Tomorrow's Record-Breaking Asteroid Flyby Of Earth

div.a: Victoria's Secret Teen Lingerie Lures Ever-Younger Girls

div.div: When Kathleen Jordan stopped at a Victoria’s Secret a year ago to buy something for herself, the visit had an unintended consequence: her 13-year-old daughter got hooked on Pink, the lingerie brand’s young collegiate line.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VTs5dk&via=Digg&text=Victoria's Secret Teen Lingerie Lures Ever-Younger Girls

div.a: Why Are Greeting Cards So Expensive?

div.div: Why should a piece of paper with a slogan cost $5? The answer starts with classical economics, takes a world tour to China, and ends with you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12OccqA&via=Digg&text=Why Are Greeting Cards So Expensive?

div.a: Is This The New Playstation Controller?

div.div: Remember when we told you of rumblings on the next PlayStation system's controller and how it might have a touchscreen? Well, get a look at this strange thing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WrppR3&via=Digg&text=Is This The New Playstation Controller?

div.a: Elon Musk's Data Doesn't Back Up His Claims Of New York Times Fakery

div.div: Elon Musk's long-awaited blog post take-down has arrived with what he claims is the data to prove New York Times John M. Broder reporter committed some sort of journalistic malpractice to run a bad review of the Tesla Model S's range capability. But what does the data actually prove?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yh8yje&via=Digg&text=Elon Musk's Data Doesn't Back Up His Claims Of New York Times Fakery

div.div: LIL BOW WOW DID IT BEFORE IT WAS COOL

div.a: Five Great Hip-Hop Videos Featuring The Actual Harlem Shake

div.div: The true Harlem Shake first broke out in G. Dep’s “Special Delivery,” but it also became a move much-loved by the formerly “lil'” Bow Wow. Wanna learn? Check out some of the best Harlem Shakes here.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXpQAz&via=Digg&text=Five Great Hip-Hop Videos Featuring The Actual Harlem Shake

div.div: MORE PAINFUL THAN LOSING THAT TOOTH

div.a: This Is The Face Of A Hockey Player As A Skate Slices Through His Achilles Tendon

div.div: Erik Karlsson, the reigning Norris Trophy winner as the NHL's best defenseman, was putting on another spectacular year. And now it's done.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XP55Zl&via=Digg&text=This Is The Face Of A Hockey Player As A Skate Slices Through His Achilles Tendon

div.a: How Much Actual Time Does Humanity Collectively Experience In One Second?

div.div: You know that thing scientists and mathematicians like Carl Sagan and Neil deGrasse Tyson do sometimes, where they throw down a bunch of numbers in reference to ideas and constants and facts that make you realize how small we are? This is one of those things.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ViqYS3&via=Digg&text=How Much Actual Time Does Humanity Collectively Experience In One Second?

div.a: How You Are Likely To Die

div.div: The chart below compares the odds of dying in any given year from choking, cycling, being struck by lightning or stung by a bee.

div.a: The Pope And The Spy Who Loved Him

div.div: The butler did it! That was the tabloid take on the unprecedented breach of security that shook the Vatican last year, when a trove of secrets plucked from one of the most impenetrable places on earth—the pope's private quarters—was leaked to the media. But why did he do it? And did he act alone?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11DPYbj&via=Digg&text=The Pope And The Spy Who Loved Him

div.a: Dumping Apple Stock Is Now A Trend

div.div: Some of the biggest hedge funds that helped make Apple Inc a stock market darling lost faith and dumped their stakes in the fourth quarter, fueling the massive drop in the iPhone maker's share price.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VgGAb4&via=Digg&text=Dumping Apple Stock Is Now A Trend

div.a: The True Story Of The Time SETI Thought They Found Aliens

div.div: The story of the SETI discussions during the discovery of pulsars has never been fully told—until now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xa7IDC&via=Digg&text=The True Story Of The Time SETI Thought They Found Aliens

div.div: It’s at least 3,000 years old, and it’s bi-curious.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12hZG2y&via=Digg&text=The World’s Oldest Pornography

div.a: Chubby Checker Sues HP Over Penis-Measuring App

div.div: Rock'n'roll pioneer Chubby Checker is suing two computer companies for allowing his name to be used as the title of an app that guesses the size of a man's penis.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12DbQi2&via=Digg&text=Chubby Checker Sues HP Over Penis-Measuring App

div.a: The Most Unfortunate Pistorius Nike Ad

div.div: The only thing that makes the Oscar Pistorius situation more tragic is this ad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XP3ToN&via=Digg&text=The Most Unfortunate Pistorius Nike Ad

div.div: Cloaked by malware and aliases, China's hackers are usually invisible. This one made a mistake.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11HyHhE&via=Digg&text=Unmasking A Chinese Hacker

div.div: THE THINGS WE DO FOR LOVE

The woman who wore this prosthetic lost her nose in the middle of the 19th century due to a raging case of syphilis. This deformity was so common amongst those suffering from the pox that ‘no nose clubs’ sprung up in London.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VWHyEi&via=Digg&text=Syphilis: A Love Story

div.a: Scandals Of Classic Hollywood: In Like Errol Flynn

div.div: Errol Flynn's famous sexual escapades seemed like just a bit of harmless fun. Until they weren’t anymore, and Flynn was charged with two counts of statutory rape. After a long, highly publicized trial, he was acquitted, but the details remain murky.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXkvJj&via=Digg&text=Scandals Of Classic Hollywood: In Like Errol Flynn

div.a: Giant Ferris Wheels Around The World

div.div: The same week that Ferris Wheel inventor George Ferris would have turned 154 years old the global race for the world's tallest wheel continues with new plans in Dubai.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXpnhO&via=Digg&text=Giant Ferris Wheels Around The World

div.a: The Epic Industrial Odyssey Of The Most Famous Valentine's Day Snack

div.div: This is the story of a little candy heart -- born in a mixer, mushed by a roller, tattooed, stamped, fed through an oven, and stuffed in a huge sack for months. Don't worry, it has a happy ending.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFhReA&via=Digg&text=The Epic Industrial Odyssey Of The Most Famous Valentine's Day Snack

div.a: 'Prisoner X' Mystery Puts Spotlight On Israel's Spy Agency

div.div: He was known as Prisoner X, his crimes unknown. For months he languished in an Israeli prison until he was he was found dead in his cell in an apparent suicide. Later, rumors would swirl that he was an Australian-Israeli who worked for the Israeli secret service Mossad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YgQfe6&via=Digg&text='Prisoner X' Mystery Puts Spotlight On Israel's Spy Agency

div.div: HONESTLY, NOT THE WORST HOUSEGUEST EVER
“I don’t have a problem with you. I just want to clear my name."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YZjKC3&via=Digg&text=Dorner's Hostages Speak Out

div.div: Alcohol helps to send millions of Americans to prison, but you'd think it would be hard to keep drinking once you got there. Not so, inmates explain.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12KB6ao&via=Digg&text=How Prisoners Make Moonshine

div.a: How To Bypass The Lockcode Screen On Anyone's iPhone Running iOS 6.1

div.div: So, iOS 6.1 hasn't been Apple's finest hour. So far it's been plagued with connection issues, battery woes, and now it's sadly insecure, too. You can bypass any lockcode on an iPhone using this straightforward sequence of button presses.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XarWNB&via=Digg&text=How To Bypass The Lockcode Screen On Anyone's iPhone Running iOS 6.1

div.a: What The U.S. Would Look Like If Every State Was Redrawn To Have Equal Populations

div.div: Here is one proposal/art project to divide the United States into 50 equal population states, thereby creating a more balanced Senate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VhbFZV&via=Digg&text=What The U.S. Would Look Like If Every State Was Redrawn To Have Equal Populations
